item.title: Mentioned by Abbotsford Times
item.description:
Abbotsford students grill MP Fast on shark fin vote - Abbotsford Times
Abbotsford MP Ed Fast talks to a group of Gordie Howe Middle School students on Monday about the reasons he voted against a recently proposed law that would have banned the import of shark fins into Canada. Photograph by: Rochelle Baker , Abbotsford ...
